title: Part A – simulateOneDay (4 points)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ indicates a point earned.

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.A] Generates a random value

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • fail to save or use the generated random value

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to call Math.random MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B4D@ , or possibly the equivalent, at least one time

  • make any incorrect call to Math.random MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B4D@

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Identifies two cases based on a comparison of a randomly generated value and some constant that implements a 5% probability

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • reverse the 5/95 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=Jarpu0dXdar=Jfr=Ji9qqpr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGynaiaac+cacaaI5aGaaGynaaaa@39C4@ probability

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Generates a random integer that is uniform in the range [10,50] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E5A@

  • call Math.random MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B4D@ incorrectly

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Scales for numBirds MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4057@ and subtracts appropriate amount from currentFood MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4327@ in all cases (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • compare double MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGKbGaae4BaiaabwhacaqGIbGaaeiBaiaabwgaaaa@36FF@ values using <= MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacqGH8aapcqGH9aqpaaa@337C@ or >= MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacqGH+aGpcqGH9aqpaaa@3380@ instead of < MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacqGH8aapaaa@3276@ or > MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacqGH+aGpaaa@327A@

title: Part B – simulateManyDays (5 points)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ indicates a point earned.

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.A] Calls simulateOneDay MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E40@ with value of numBirds MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGUbGaaeyDaiaab2gacaqGcbGaaeyAaiaabkhacaqGKbGaae4Caaaa@38CE@

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to make at least one correct call to simulateOneDay MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E40@

  • make any call to simulateOneDay MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E40@ on the class or on an object other than this MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqG0bGaaeiAaiaabMgacaqGZbaaaa@3536@ (use of this MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqG0bGaaeiAaiaabMgacaqGZbaaaa@3536@ is optional)

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Loops over the simulation method call and guards that it runs at most numDays MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGUbGaaeyDaiaab2gacaqGebGaaeyyaiaabMhacaqGZbaaaa@37E8@ times

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • call the method that simulates one day incorrectly

  • count the simulated days incorrectly, as long as the loop guard would work if the count were corrected

  • fail to guard against calls to the simulation method when currentFood<=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E62@

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to count the simulated days at all

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Counts the number of times that the method that simulates one day is called with food available in the feeder (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • simulate extra days when currentFood MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B9E@ is 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaaIWaaaaa@322C@ , as long as the count is still correct

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to initialize the counter appropriately

  • compute the correct count but return something else

  • fail to test if food is available

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Compares currentFood MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B9E@ and 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaaIWaaaaa@322C@

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • fail to make the comparison in the context of a loop

  • use the result of the comparison incorrectly

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.B] Returns any int MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGPbGaaeOBaiaabshaaaa@3446@ value, in all cases

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • return a constant
